about_the_game:
BLAST Off into SPACEVENTURE! Become Ace Hardway, a "Life Support Systems technician" (let’s be honest—a space plumber), and his robotic dog, Rooter, on an epic intergalactic misadventure. When a routine repair job spirals into galaxy-spanning chaos, Ace finds himself battling sewer monsters, evading crooked cops, and uncovering a sinister conspiracy involving mind-controlling video game consoles. Along the way, you'll build a new spaceship, tinker with bizarre tech, and navigate quirky worlds filled with alien oddballs, unstable AIs, and absurd puzzles.

Created by the minds behind the beloved Space Quest series, SpaceVenture combines sharp humor, challenging puzzles, and nostalgic charm in a modern point-and-click adventure. Featuring stellar voice acting, a retro-inspired score, and endless nods to sci-fi classics, this crowdfunded game delivers a hilarious and heartwarming romp through the stars. Will Ace and Rooter save the galaxy or just make a cosmic mess? Only one way to find out!

  • Build your ship – Scavenge for parts, refuel with questionable bio-waste, and piece together your interstellar junker as you forge your path across the stars.

  • Explore a galaxy of interesting locales – From junk asteroids and sketchy space stations to alien deserts and the Hyperspace Beltway, every stop is packed with puzzles, and that trademark Two Guys from Andromeda humor.

  • Interact with unforgettable characters – Encounter crooked cops, eccentric inventors, shady CEOs, and a robotic dog with a nose for trouble. Everyone has a story... and some of them want you gone.

  • Solve challenging puzzles with a comedic twist – Use your wits, tools, and trusty PDA apps to fix leaks, outsmart enemies, and uncover hidden truths about a galaxy-sized conspiracy.
